transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir Nancy baat kar rahi hu actually main ek video meeting pe thi aapne call kiya.
Customer: Haan, 12 baje ka schedule bola mujhe mere se hai na.
Executive: Haan haan abhi maine aapko link bheja hai sir mail ID open kariye join kariye meeting.
Customer: Haan karta hu main. Bheja kya abhi aapne?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aaya nahi abhi.
Executive: Main 4 baje gayi thi aap bhi bhi nahi.
Customer: Do ghante pehle.
Customer: Ruko abhi toh aaya nahi. Ek minute. Ah main mail ID batau kya ek baar aapko ye Anupam Santra wala.
Customer: Haan haan woh batao. @bymmail.com.
Customer: Haan theek hi toh hai mail ID ek minute.
Executive: Ek baar refresh kar lo Nancy ke naam se aayega.
Customer: Haan pehle toh aaya tha ek minute Nancy.

Customer: Hmm ek minute woh ek khol ke dekhta hu. Yahoo se aaya kya.
Customer: Do minute line pe rahiye matlab.
Customer: Out ho gaya.
Customer: Main karta hu jara aap thoda sa mujhe time do. Theek hai?
Executive: Aap join kariye wait kar rahi hu meeting mein. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received the meeting link.

Resolution:

- Executive asked to refresh the mail.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the meeting later.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, link, mail id
